about_the_game:
Immerse your Beaver Manor in a playful, spooky vibe with enchanting Halloween decorations for all your existing rooms! This pack doesn’t add new rooms but enriches every current space with delightful frights. Adorn renovations with cheerful pumpkins, whimsical witches, and ghostly figures, ensuring each corner exudes Halloween spirit. Enjoy a charmingly eerie adventure as you continue your renovation journey, infusing each space with a blend of fun and festivity without altering your beloved manor's existing layout. Bewitching transformations await!

Please note: This DLC is designed to embellish your existing spaces with the festive thrill of Halloween and does not include the addition of new rooms to the Beaver Manor.

Immerse your Beaver Manor in a playful, spooky vibe with enchanting Halloween decorations for all your existing rooms! This pack doesn’t add new rooms but enriches every current space with delightful frights. Adorn renovations with cheerful pumpkins, whimsical witches, and ghostly figures, ensuring each corner exudes Halloween spirit. Enjoy a charmingly eerie adventure as you continue your renovation journey, infusing each space with a blend of fun and festivity without altering your beloved manor's existing layout. Bewitching transformations await!

Please note: This DLC is designed to embellish your existing spaces with the festive thrill of Halloween and does not include the addition of new rooms to the Beaver Manor.
name: Bingo Beavers - Halloween Decorations

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Transform your Beaver Manor with enchanting Halloween decor! No new rooms, but every space brims with festive frights from whimsical witches to ghostly figures. A charmingly eerie adventure through each existing spot awaits!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Czech*, Dutch*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Ukrainian*, Indonesian*
*languages with full audio support
